R offers a multitude of packages related to health economics (comprehensive list on [hub.qmd](the Hub)). Below you can find a starter on the most common packages divided by indication.
# State transition models
State transition models are used to describe transitions between health states (e.g. healthy to sick). A number of models are available to implement in R.
## Decision trees
- `{rdecision}`
- `{data.tree}`
## Markov models
- `{mstate}`
- `{hesim}`
- `{heemod}`
## Microsimulation
- `{gems}` - Generalized Multistate Simulation Model
